name: Can You Survive? Escape From The Graveyard
name_original: Can You Survive? Escape From The Graveyard
description: Can You Survive? Escape From The Graveyard is the Second Game of a Survivor Horror Games Series, Developed by Bruno Araujo in Muion Games Studio (an Indie Studio From Brazil)... Can You Survive? it's a very simple and good game made for you that like fps and zombie games!
